detection_criteria.description: Elevated density with strong Bz but no coincident flare
detection_criteria.test_condition: CLUFT residual observation without X-ray correlation

cluft_analysis.residual_observation: Strong Bz deviation without corresponding flare signature
cluft_analysis.hypothesis_test: Observing curl residual (Δ) alignment with lattice correction C_luft = μ₀ α × n̂

research_context.question: When strong Bz exists without flare coincidence, does the observed magnetic field structure show residual alignment?
research_context.significance: Tests whether CLUFT correction predictions hold for solar wind-only conditions
research_context.next_step: Compare measured field structure with predicted lattice correction vector

notes: This event demonstrates the CLUFT_DEVIATION detection mode: strong magnetic field structure without flare component. Provides test case for lattice correction hypothesis in solar wind regime.
